images.copyright: Andermatt village in the Alps, Switzerland (© Xantana/Getty Images)
images.title: A Swiss escape
images.caption: Andermatt village in the Alps, Switzerland
images.desc: Nestled in the Urseren Valley at about 4,715 feet, Andermatt is a charming Swiss village embraced by the majestic Alps. Long a vital crossroads, it's linked by three iconic passes—Gotthard, Furka, and Oberalp—each enhancing its allure as a gateway between regions and cultures.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
